statements.statement: SELECT [THUOCGAYNGHINGOADR_ID] ,[PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID] ,TT.[DUOC_ID] ,TT.[HAMLUONG] ,[LIEUDUNGMOTLAN] ,[SOLANDUNG] ,TT.[DUONGDUNG_ID] ,[NGAYBATDAU] ,[NGAYKETTHUC] ,[HANSUDUNG] ,TT.[HANGSANXUAT_ID] ,[LYDODUNGTHUOC] ,D.TENDUOCDAYDU TENDUOC ,D.DONVITINH DVT ,DUONGDUNG.DICTIONARY_NAME DUONGDUNG FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_ADR] TT INNER JOIN TM_DUOC D ON TT.DUOC_ID=D.DUOC_ID LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DUONGDUNG ON TT.DUONGDUNG_ID = DUONGDUNG.DICTIONARY_ID WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID = '$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$'

SELECT [THUOCSUDUNGDONGTHOI_ID] ,[PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID] ,DT.[DUOC_ID] ,DT.[DONVITINH_ID] ,[SONGAY] ,[NGAYBATDAU] ,[NGAYKETTHUC] ,D.TENDUOCDAYDU TENDUOC ,D.DONVITINH DVT ,D.HAMLUONG HAMLUONG FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_DONGTHOI] DT INNER JOIN TM_DUOC D ON DT.DUOC_ID=D.DUOC_ID WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$'
select HANGSANXUAT_ID, TENHANGSANXUAT from TM_HANGSANXUAT

SELECT top 1 [PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID] ,[SOPHIEU] ,[BENHNHAN_ID] ,[CANNANG] ,[PHANUNGNHANXET] ,[CHANDOAN_CHIDINH_DIEUTRI] ,[TAISDTHUOC_TRIEUCHUNGLAPLAI] ,[TAISDTHUOC_KHONGXHTRCHUNGCU] ,[CACBENHSULIENQUAN] ,[BINHLUANBACSIDIEUTRI] ,[YKIENCHUYENGIATHAMDINH] ,[NGUOILAP_ID] ,[SODIENTHOAI_NGUOILAP] ,[EMAIL_NGUOILAP] ,[NGAYLAPBAOCAO] ,[CHUCVU_ID] ,[SOFAX] ,[DANGBAOCAO] ,[NGAYTAO] ,[NGUOITAO_ID] ,[NGAYCAPNHAT] ,[NGUOICAPNHAT_ID] ,[NGAYXUATHIENPHANUNG] ,[XUATHIENPHANUNGSAU] ,[MOTABIEUHIENADR] ,[CACXETNGHIEMLIENQUAN] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TUVONG] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DEDOATINHMANG] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_NHAPVIEN] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TANTAT] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DITATTHAINHI] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_KHONGNT] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_CO] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_KHONG] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_GIAMLIEU] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_KHONGCOTT] ,[TAISD_CO] ,[TAISD_KHONG] ,[TAISD_KHONGTAISD] ,[TAISD_KHONGCOTT] ,[KQ_TUVONG] ,[KQ_CHUAHOIPHUC] ,[KQ_CODICHUNG] ,[KQ_KHONGRO] ,[KQ_TUVONGKHONGLIENQUAN] ,[KQ_DANGHOIPHUC] ,[KQ_HOIPHUCKHONGCODC] ,[DG_CHACCHAN] ,[DG_KHONGCHACCHAN] ,[DG_COKHANANG] ,[DG_CHUAPHANLOAI] ,[DG_KHAC] ,[DG_KHAC_TEXT] ,[THANG_NARAJIO] ,[THANG_WHO] ,[LANDAU] ,[BOSUNG] ,[GUIXACNHAN] ,[PHANLOAIPHANUNG] ,[PHANUNGDACOTRONGYVAN] ,[NHAPDULIEU_HECSDL] ,[NHAPDULIEU_VIGIFLOW] ,[THUOCMOI] ,[THUOCCU] ,[NGHIEMTRONG] ,[KHONGNGHIEMTRONG] ,[MUCDO_DEDOATINHMANG] ,[MUCDO_NHAPVIEN] ,[MUCDO_GAYDITAT] ,[MUCDO_LAMDUNG] ,[GUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG] ,[NGAYGUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG] ,[GUIBAOCAO_UMC] ,[NGAYGUIBAOCAO_UMC] ,[KQTD_CHACCHAN] ,[KQTD_KHONGCHACCHAN] ,[KQTD_KHAC] ,[KQTD_KHAC_TEXT] ,[KQTD_COKHANANG] ,[KQTD_CHUAPHANLOAI] ,[KQTD_COTHE] ,[KQTD_KHONGTHEPHANLOAI] ,[NGUOIQUANLYBAOCAO_ID] ,[NGAY_QUANLYBAOCAO] FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH] WHERE [BENHNHAN_ID] = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID = '$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$'
order by NGAYTAO desc
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH] ( [SOPHIEU] ,[BENHNHAN_ID] ,[CANNANG] ,[CHANDOAN_CHIDINH_DIEUTRI] ,[CACBENHSULIENQUAN] ,[BINHLUANBACSIDIEUTRI] ,[YKIENCHUYENGIATHAMDINH] ,[NGUOILAP_ID] ,[SODIENTHOAI_NGUOILAP] ,[EMAIL_NGUOILAP] ,[NGAYLAPBAOCAO] ,[CHUCVU_ID] ,[SOFAX] ,[DANGBAOCAO] ,[NGAYTAO] ,[NGUOITAO_ID] ,[NGAYCAPNHAT] ,[NGUOICAPNHAT_ID] ,[NGAYXUATHIENPHANUNG] ,[XUATHIENPHANUNGSAU] ,[MOTABIEUHIENADR] ,[CACXETNGHIEMLIENQUAN] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TUVONG] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DEDOATINHMANG] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_NHAPVIEN] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TANTAT] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DITATTHAINHI] ,[MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_KHONGNT] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_CO] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_KHONG] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_GIAMLIEU] ,[SAUKHINGUNG_KHONGCOTT] ,[TAISD_CO] ,[TAISD_KHONG] ,[TAISD_KHONGTAISD] ,[TAISD_KHONGCOTT] ,[KQ_TUVONG] ,[KQ_CHUAHOIPHUC] ,[KQ_CODICHUNG] ,[KQ_KHONGRO] ,[KQ_TUVONGKHONGLIENQUAN] ,[KQ_DANGHOIPHUC] ,[KQ_HOIPHUCKHONGCODC] ,[DG_CHACCHAN] ,[DG_KHONGCHACCHAN] ,[DG_COKHANANG] ,[DG_CHUAPHANLOAI] ,[DG_KHAC] ,[DG_KHAC_TEXT] ,[THANG_NARAJIO] ,[THANG_WHO] ,[LANDAU] ,[BOSUNG] ,[GUIXACNHAN] ,[PHANLOAIPHANUNG] ,[PHANUNGDACOTRONGYVAN] ,[NHAPDULIEU_HECSDL] ,[NHAPDULIEU_VIGIFLOW] ,[THUOCMOI] ,[THUOCCU] ,[NGHIEMTRONG] ,[KHONGNGHIEMTRONG] ,[MUCDO_DEDOATINHMANG] ,[MUCDO_NHAPVIEN] ,[MUCDO_GAYDITAT] ,[MUCDO_LAMDUNG] ,[GUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG] ,[NGAYGUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG] ,[GUIBAOCAO_UMC] ,[NGAYGUIBAOCAO_UMC] ,[KQTD_CHACCHAN] ,[KQTD_KHONGCHACCHAN] ,[KQTD_KHAC] ,[KQTD_KHAC_TEXT] ,[KQTD_COKHANANG] ,[KQTD_CHUAPHANLOAI] ,[KQTD_COTHE] ,[KQTD_KHONGTHEPHANLOAI] ,[NGUOIQUANLYBAOCAO_ID] ,[NGAY_QUANLYBAOCAO] ,[TIEPNHAN_ID] ,[BENHAN_ID]) VALUES ( #SOPHIEU# ,#BENHNHAN_ID# ,#CANNANG# ,#CHANDOAN_CHIDINH_DIEUTRI# ,#CACBENHSULIENQUAN# ,#BINHLUANBACSIDIEUTRI# ,#YKIENCHUYENGIATHAMDINH# ,#NGUOILAP_ID# ,#SODIENTHOAI_NGUOILAP# ,#EMAIL_NGUOILAP# ,#NGAYLAPBAOCAO# ,#CHUCVU_ID# ,#SOFAX# ,#DANGBAOCAO# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,#NGAYXUATHIENPHANUNG# ,#XUATHIENPHANUNGSAU# ,#MOTABIEUHIENADR# ,#CACXETNGHIEMLIENQUAN# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TUVONG# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DEDOATINHMANG# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_NHAPVIEN# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_TANTAT# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_DITATTHAINHI# ,#MUCDONGHIEMTRONG_KHONGNT# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_CO# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_KHONG# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_GIAMLIEU# ,#SAUKHINGUNG_KHONGCOTT# ,#TAISD_CO# ,#TAISD_KHONG# ,#TAISD_KHONGTAISD# ,#TAISD_KHONGCOTT# ,#KQ_TUVONG# ,#KQ_CHUAHOIPHUC# ,#KQ_CODICHUNG# ,#KQ_KHONGRO# ,#KQ_TUVONGKHONGLIENQUAN# ,#KQ_DANGHOIPHUC# ,#KQ_HOIPHUCKHONGCODC# ,#DG_CHACCHAN# ,#DG_KHONGCHACCHAN# ,#DG_COKHANANG# ,#DG_CHUAPHANLOAI# ,#DG_KHAC# ,#DG_KHAC_TEXT# ,#THANG_NARAJIO# ,#THANG_WHO# ,#LANDAU# ,#BOSUNG# ,#GUIXACNHAN# ,#PHANLOAIPHANUNG# ,#PHANUNGDACOTRONGYVAN# ,#NHAPDULIEU_HECSDL# ,#NHAPDULIEU_VIGIFLOW# ,#THUOCMOI# ,#THUOCCU# ,#NGHIEMTRONG# ,#KHONGNGHIEMTRONG# ,#MUCDO_DEDOATINHMANG# ,#MUCDO_NHAPVIEN# ,#MUCDO_GAYDITAT# ,#MUCDO_LAMDUNG# ,#GUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG# ,#NGAYGUIBAOCAO_HOIDONG# ,#GUIBAOCAO_UMC# ,#NGAYGUIBAOCAO_UMC# ,#KQTD_CHACCHAN# ,#KQTD_KHONGCHACCHAN# ,#KQTD_KHAC# ,#KQTD_KHAC_TEXT# ,#KQTD_COKHANANG# ,#KQTD_CHUAPHANLOAI# ,#KQTD_COTHE# ,#KQTD_KHONGTHEPHANLOAI# ,#NGUOIQUANLYBAOCAO_ID# ,#NGAY_QUANLYBAOCAO# ,#TIEPNHAN_ID# ,#BENHAN_ID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY as value

INSERT INTO [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_ADR] ([PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID] ,[DUOC_ID] ,[HAMLUONG] ,[LIEUDUNGMOTLAN] ,[SOLANDUNG] ,[DUONGDUNG_ID] ,[NGAYBATDAU] ,[NGAYKETTHUC] ,[HANSUDUNG] ,[HANGSANXUAT_ID] ,[NGUOITAO_ID] ,[NGAYTAO] ,[NGUOICAPNHAT_ID] ,[NGAYCAPNHAT] ,[LYDODUNGTHUOC]) VALUES (#PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID# ,#DUOC_ID# ,#HAMLUONG# ,#LIEUDUNGMOTLAN# ,#SOLANDUNG# ,#DUONGDUNG_ID# ,#NGAYBATDAU# ,#NGAYKETTHUC# ,#HANSUDUNG# ,#HANGSANXUAT_ID# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#LYDODUNGTHUOC#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY as value

INSERT INTO [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_DONGTHOI] ([PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID] ,[DUOC_ID] ,[NGAYBATDAU] ,[NGAYKETTHUC]) VALUES ( #PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID# ,#DUOC_ID# ,#NGAYBATDAU# ,#NGAYKETTHUC# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY as value
statements.statement: IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID FROM TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$' AND NGUOITAO_ID='$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$') BEGIN SELECT -1 AS result END else begin SELECT 1 AS result end

DELETE FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_DONGTHOI] WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$' DELETE FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_ADR] WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$' DELETE FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH] WHERE PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID='$PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID$'
DELETE FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_DONGTHOI] WHERE THUOCSUDUNGDONGTHOI_ID='$THUOCSUDUNGDONGTHOI_ID$'
DELETE FROM [TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH_ADR] WHERE THUOCGAYNGHINGOADR_ID='$THUOCGAYNGHINGOADR_ID$'

select a.PHANUNGTHUOCCOHAI_ID, a.SOPHIEU, a.BENHNHAN_ID, a.CANNANG, a.NGAYXUATHIENPHANUNG, a.XUATHIENPHANUNGSAU, a.MOTABIEUHIENADR ,a.PHANUNGNHANXET, a.NGAYLAPBAOCAO, c.TIEPNHAN_ID, d.SOBENHAN, d.BENHAN_ID , b.MAYTE + ' - ' + b.TENBENHNHAN as TENBENHNHAN from TT_NOITRU_THUPUTCH a join TT_BENHNHAN b on a.BENHNHAN_ID = b.BENHNHAN_ID join TT_TIEPNHAN c on c.BENHNHAN_ID = b.BENHNHAN_ID join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN d on d.TIEPNHAN_ID = c.TIEPNHAN_ID
(a.SOPHIEU like '%' + #KEY# + '%' or b.MAYTE like '%' + #KEY# + '%' or b.TENBENHNHAN like '%' + #KEY# + '%')
convert(date,a.NGAYTAO) >= convert(date,'$DATEFROM$')
convert(date,a.NGAYTAO) <= convert(date,'$DATETO$')

Insert into TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY ( BENHAN_ID, TIEPNHAN_ID, SOPHIEU, BACSITRILIEU_ID, NGAYTRILIEU, DG_TINHTRANGSUCKHOE, DG_KETQUATHUCHIEN, DG_CAMNHANBENHNHAN, DG_NHANXETKETQUA, DG_BENHNHAN_NGUOINHAN, HD_BATDAU, HD_KETTHUC, HD_HOATDONG, HD_KEHOACHTIEPTHEO, HD_DIEMCHUY, NGAYTAO, NGUOITAO_ID, NGAYCAPNHAT, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID, BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #BENHAN_ID#, #TIEPNHAN_ID#, #SOPHIEU#, #BACSITRILIEU_ID#, #NGAYTRILIEU#, #DG_TINHTRANGSUCKHOE#, #DG_KETQUATHUCHIEN#, #DG_CAMNHANBENHNHAN#, #DG_NHANXETKETQUA#, #DG_BENHNHAN_NGUOINHAN#, #HD_BATDAU#, #HD_KETTHUC#, #HD_HOATDONG#, #HD_KEHOACHTIEPTHEO#, #HD_DIEMCHUY#, #NGAYTAO#, #NGUOITAO_ID#, #NGAYCAPNHAT#, #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, #BENHVIEN_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() as value

Update TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY set BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID#, TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID#, SOPHIEU = #SOPHIEU#, BACSITRILIEU_ID = #BACSITRILIEU_ID#, NGAYTRILIEU = #NGAYTRILIEU#, DG_TINHTRANGSUCKHOE = #DG_TINHTRANGSUCKHOE#, DG_KETQUATHUCHIEN = #DG_KETQUATHUCHIEN#, DG_CAMNHANBENHNHAN = #DG_CAMNHANBENHNHAN#, DG_NHANXETKETQUA = #DG_NHANXETKETQUA#, DG_BENHNHAN_NGUOINHAN = #DG_BENHNHAN_NGUOINHAN#, HD_BATDAU = #HD_BATDAU#, HD_KETTHUC = #HD_KETTHUC#, HD_HOATDONG = #HD_HOATDONG#, HD_KEHOACHTIEPTHEO = #HD_KEHOACHTIEPTHEO#, HD_DIEMCHUY = #HD_DIEMCHUY#, NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO#, NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where DIEUTRITAMLY_ID = '$DIEUTRITAMLY_ID$'
delete TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY where DIEUTRITAMLY_ID = '$DIEUTRITAMLY_ID$'

Insert into TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY_SOKET ( BENHAN_ID, TIEPNHAN_ID, LAN, NGUOICANTHIEP_ID, CHANDOAN, DANHGIAKETQUA, MUCTIEUCANTHIEP, CHUONGTRINHCANTHIEP, LUUY, NGAYTAO, NGUOITAO_ID, NGAYCAPNHAT, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID, BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #BENHAN_ID#, #TIEPNHAN_ID#, #LAN#, #NGUOICANTHIEP_ID#, #CHANDOAN#, #DANHGIAKETQUA#, #MUCTIEUCANTHIEP#, #CHUONGTRINHCANTHIEP#, #LUUY#, #NGAYTAO#, #NGUOITAO_ID#, #NGAYCAPNHAT#, #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, #BENHVIEN_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() as value

Update TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY_SOKET set BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID#, TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID#, LAN = #LAN#, NGUOICANTHIEP_ID = #NGUOICANTHIEP_ID#, CHANDOAN = #CHANDOAN#, DANHGIAKETQUA = #DANHGIAKETQUA#, MUCTIEUCANTHIEP = #MUCTIEUCANTHIEP#, CHUONGTRINHCANTHIEP = #CHUONGTRINHCANTHIEP#, LUUY = #LUUY#, NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO#, NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where DIEUTRITAMLY_SOKET_ID = '$DIEUTRITAMLY_SOKET_ID$'
delete TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY_SOKET where DIEUTRITAMLY_SOKET_ID = '$DIEUTRITAMLY_SOKET_ID$'

Insert into TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY_LAMSANG ( BENHAN_ID, TIEPNHAN_ID, LYDO, TIENTRIEN, YEUTONGUYENNHAN, YEUTOKHOIDAU, YEUTODUYTRI, YEUTOBAOVE, YEUTO_LNVDSK, KINHNHIEMGIAIQUYET, MONGDOI, KETQUADANHGIA, CHANDOAN, KHDT_LIEUPHAPTAMLY, KHDT_THANHVIENTHAMGIA, KHDT_THOIGIANDIEUTRI, NGAYBOSUNG, NOIDUNG, NGAYTAO, NGUOITAO_ID, NGAYCAPNHAT, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID, BENHVIEN_ID) values ( #BENHAN_ID#, #TIEPNHAN_ID#, #LYDO#, #TIENTRIEN#, #YEUTONGUYENNHAN#, #YEUTOKHOIDAU#, #YEUTODUYTRI#, #YEUTOBAOVE#, #YEUTO_LNVDSK#, #KINHNHIEMGIAIQUYET#, #MONGDOI#, #KETQUADANHGIA#, #CHANDOAN#, #KHDT_LIEUPHAPTAMLY#, #KHDT_THANHVIENTHAMGIA#, #KHDT_THOIGIANDIEUTRI#, #NGAYBOSUNG#, #NOIDUNG#, #NGAYTAO#, #NGUOITAO_ID#, #NGAYCAPNHAT#, #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, #BENHVIEN_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() as value

Update TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY_LAMSANG set BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID#, TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID#, LYDO = #LYDO#, TIENTRIEN = #TIENTRIEN#, YEUTONGUYENNHAN = #YEUTONGUYENNHAN#, YEUTOKHOIDAU = #YEUTOKHOIDAU#, YEUTODUYTRI = #YEUTODUYTRI#, YEUTOBAOVE = #YEUTOBAOVE#, YEUTO_LNVDSK = #YEUTO_LNVDSK#, KINHNHIEMGIAIQUYET = #KINHNHIEMGIAIQUYET#, MONGDOI = #MONGDOI#, KETQUADANHGIA = #KETQUADANHGIA#, CHANDOAN = #CHANDOAN#, KHDT_LIEUPHAPTAMLY = #KHDT_LIEUPHAPTAMLY#, KHDT_THANHVIENTHAMGIA = #KHDT_THANHVIENTHAMGIA#, KHDT_THOIGIANDIEUTRI = #KHDT_THOIGIANDIEUTRI#, NGAYBOSUNG = #NGAYBOSUNG#, NOIDUNG = #NOIDUNG#, NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO#, NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
delete TT_NOITRU_DIEUTRITAMLY_LAMSANG where BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'

Insert into TT_NOITRU_CHUYENKHOA ( BENHNHAN_ID, QUANHUYEN_ID, XAPHUONG_ID, BACSI_ID, CONTHU, TINHTRANGHONNHAN, SOCON, NGAYKHAM, NGAYKHAM_TEXT, DIACHIBAOTIN, LYDODENKHAM, MACBENHLANDAU, KETQUA, TIENSU_BANTHAN, TIENSU_GIADINH, KLS_NOIKHOA, KSL_CACCHUYENKHOA, KHAMTAMTHAN_TIEPXUC, YTHUC_THOIGIAN, YTHUC_KHONGGIAN, YTHUC_BANTHAN, YTHUC_XUNGQUANH, YTHUC_TRIGIAC, YTHUC_TUDUY, YTHUC_CAMXUC, YTHUC_CHUY, YTHUC_TRITUE, YTHUC_TRINHO, YTHUC_HANHVI, CANLAMSANG, TOMTATBENHAN, CHANDOANTRIEUCHUNG, CHANDOANXACDINH, MASO, BENHKEMTHEO, TIENLUONG, DIEUTRI_THUOCHUONGTHAN, DIEUTRI_PHCN, DIEUTRI_DONGVIENNGUOIBENH, NHACNHO_NGUOIBENH, LYNHO_NHACNHO, HUONGDANNHACNHO, LYDO_HUONGDAN, KQDT_KHOI, KQDT_ONDINH, KQDT_KHONGTHAYDOI, NGAYTAO, NGUOITAO_ID, NGAYCAPNHAT, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID, BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #BENHNHAN_ID#, #QUANHUYEN_ID#, #XAPHUONG_ID#, #BACSI_ID#, #CONTHU#, #TINHTRANGHONNHAN#, #SOCON#, #NGAYKHAM#, #NGAYKHAM_TEXT#, #DIACHIBAOTIN#, #LYDODENKHAM#, #MACBENHLANDAU#, #KETQUA#, #TIENSU_BANTHAN#, #TIENSU_GIADINH#, #KLS_NOIKHOA#, #KSL_CACCHUYENKHOA#, #KHAMTAMTHAN_TIEPXUC#, #YTHUC_THOIGIAN#, #YTHUC_KHONGGIAN#, #YTHUC_BANTHAN#, #YTHUC_XUNGQUANH#, #YTHUC_TRIGIAC#, #YTHUC_TUDUY#, #YTHUC_CAMXUC#, #YTHUC_CHUY#, #YTHUC_TRITUE#, #YTHUC_TRINHO#, #YTHUC_HANHVI#, #CANLAMSANG#, #TOMTATBENHAN#, #CHANDOANTRIEUCHUNG#, #CHANDOANXACDINH#, #MASO#, #BENHKEMTHEO#, #TIENLUONG#, #DIEUTRI_THUOCHUONGTHAN#, #DIEUTRI_PHCN#, #DIEUTRI_DONGVIENNGUOIBENH#, #NHACNHO_NGUOIBENH#, #LYNHO_NHACNHO#, #HUONGDANNHACNHO#, #LYDO_HUONGDAN#, #KQDT_KHOI#, #KQDT_ONDINH#, #KQDT_KHONGTHAYDOI#, #NGAYTAO#, #NGUOITAO_ID#, #NGAYCAPNHAT#, #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, #BENHVIEN_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() as value
